name: limineZZsweeperIE
description: LiMineZZsweeperIE - A strategic minesweeper roguelike made for Lizzie

scripts.analyze: npm run deps:circular && npm run deps:orphans && npm run deps
scripts.help:
echo "Available commands:
  npm run deps - Generate dependency graph
  npm run deps:list - List all dependencies
  npm run deps:circular - Check for circular dependencies
  npm run deps:orphans - Find orphaned modules
  npm run analyze - Run full dependency analysis
  npm run serve - Start local dev server
  npm test - Run all Playwright tests
  npm run test:phase2 - Run Phase 2 tests only"
